Flask application for user authentication and profile management.

class app.User(user_id, username)¶

Bases: UserMixin

User class for Flask-Login.

app.connect_db()¶

Connects to the database.

app.create_table()¶

Creates a table if it doesn’t exist.

app.hash_password(password)¶

Hashes the given password with a salt.

app.load_user(user_id)¶

Loads a user from the database by ID.

app.login()¶

Handles user login.

app.logout()¶

Logs out the current user.

app.profile()¶

Displays the user’s profile page.

app.verify_password(stored_password, input_password)¶

Verifies the given password against the stored hash.
